title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
abusenius left at 00:10 (Ping timeout: 240 seconds mflorea left at 00:20 (Quit: Leaving. anamarias left at 00:47 (Quit: anamarias jvelociter left at 00:52 (Quit: jvelociter florinciu joined #xwiki at 00:58 cypromis left at 01:00 (Read error: Operation timed out cypromis joined #xwiki at 01:00 florinciu1 joined #xwiki at 01:17 florinciu left at 01:19 (Ping timeout: 268 seconds degro left #xwiki at 01:47 florinciu1 left at 01:52 (Read error: Connection reset by peer florinciu joined #xwiki at 06:28 Denis left at 07:04 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds florinciu left at 07:06 (Read error: Connection reset by peer Denis joined #xwiki at 07:08 sdumitriu left at 07:16 (Ping timeout: 246 seconds florinciu joined #xwiki at 07:27 mflorea joined #xwiki at 07:42 vmassol joined #xwiki at 08:00 silviar joined #xwiki at 08:26 kibahop joined #xwiki at 08:39 annacondan joined #xwiki at 08:39 florinciu left at 08:49 (Read error: Connection reset by peer anamarias joined #xwiki at 08:56 vmassol left at 09:24 (Quit: Leaving. arkub joined #xwiki at 09:32 Enygma` joined #xwiki at 09:41 evalica joined #xwiki at 09:42 jvdrean joined #xwiki at 09:51 florinciu joined #xwiki at 10:08 abusenius joined #xwiki at 10:12 tmortagne joined #xwiki at 10:42 annacondan left at 10:48 (Quit: annacondan annacondan joined #xwiki at 10:58 vmassol joined #xwiki at 11:01 tmortagne left at 11:10 (Quit: Leaving. tmortagne joined #xwiki at 11:12 florinciu left at 11:26 (Read error: Connection reset by peer KermitTheFragger joined #xwiki at 11:33 evalica left at 11:36 (Read error: Connection reset by peer sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 11:36 evalica joined #xwiki at 11:36 florinciu joined #xwiki at 11:36 mflorea left at 11:37 (Quit: Leaving. jvelociter joined #xwiki at 11:37 vmassol - (11:49): tmortagne: do you understand why for some panels the description is wrapped (put in a

) and for others it's ok on http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Panels/ ? tmortagne - (11:50): vmassol: i guess it depends how the panel is written, what panels in wrapped and should not ? vmassol - (11:51): tmortagne: have a look here: http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Panels/ vmassol - (11:51): (I'm taking about the description field) kibahop left #xwiki at 11:51 tmortagne - (11:52): vmassol: probably a xwiki/2.0 vs xwiki/1.0 panels thing tmortagne - (11:53): i guess when you render xwiki/2.0 panel description you get a

around it because that's the way rendering is working, i.e. the description is not parsed as inline content when you parse it alone tmortagne - (11:54): we need a parse inline tools accessible from velocity like we do in java for some use cases vmassol - (11:59): indeed you're right vmassol - (11:59): it's a 1.0 vs 2.0 vmassol - (12:00): hmmm vmassol - (12:00): do we want to limit descirption to text only and not render it for now? vmassol - (12:02): it would make a bit of sense since the value is used in a list and rendering it might cause some pb tmortagne - (12:03): vmassol: well, that would be a API breakage but appart from this i don't think it's reallt necessary to render panel description, or at least is should be inline content annacondan left at 12:03 (Quit: annacondan vmassol - (12:04): actually the desc should have been a string property probably istead vmassol - (12:04): instead vmassol - (12:06): so how do we display a textarea in a list so that it always looks nice vmassol - (12:06): ? vmassol - (12:06): maybe in a livetable vmassol - (12:06): instead vmassol - (12:06): yes I know, I like livetables ;) tmortagne - (12:07): vmassol: we do the same trick we use in places we need inline content waiting for real inline parser vmassol - (12:07): tmortagne: I'm talking about UI vmassol - (12:07): using a livetable makes the most sense to me actually tmortagne - (12:07): as always ;) vmassol - (12:07): yep vmassol - (12:08): it's most consistnet with the rest vmassol - (12:08): s/most/more/ tmortagne - (12:08): XWiki will turn into Excel :) vmassol - (12:08): it also scales if there are lots of panels annacondan joined #xwiki at 12:08 tmortagne - (12:09): yep tmortagne - (12:09): livetable is the best we have for dynamic list of things annacondan left at 12:10 (Client Quit vmassol - (12:11): ok I'll try my livetable skills.... jvelociter - (12:12): tmortagne: BTW did you "order" a nice icon for the admin Search category ? tmortagne - (12:13): jvelociter: not yet tmortagne - (12:13): (was planning to send a mail about new search admin UI and talk about the icon) tmortagne - (12:14): i will do it now before i forgot by working on something else tmortagne - (12:14): s/forgot/forget/ mflorea joined #xwiki at 12:17 Ciprian joined #xwiki at 12:19 jvdrean left at 12:19 (Quit: Leaving. vmassol - (12:20): jvelociter: is this document still a draft: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/LiveTable ? vmassol - (12:20): if not, maybe you could remove the warning at the top? jvelociter - (12:21): vmassol: IMHO it's still a drag jvelociter - (12:21): draft jvelociter - (12:21): I don't like it very much jvelociter - (12:21): it mixes different things Ciprian left at 12:31 (Ping timeout: 248 seconds vmassol left at 12:38 (Quit: Leaving. jvdrean joined #xwiki at 12:48 mariusbutuc joined #xwiki at 13:07 Sorinello joined #xwiki at 13:13 annacondan joined #xwiki at 13:16 Sorinello left at 13:16 (Client Quit Sorinello joined #xwiki at 13:17 silviar left at 13:18 (Quit: Leaving. Sorinello left at 13:27 (Quit: Peace and Protection 4.22 Sorinello joined #xwiki at 13:28 florinciu left at 13:36 (Read error: Connection reset by peer florinciu joined #xwiki at 13:49 sdumitriu left at 13:54 (Quit: Leaving. anamarias left at 13:57 (Quit: anamarias silviar joined #xwiki at 13:58 bbc581 joined #xwiki at 14:20 mariusbutuc left at 14:34 (Quit: Leaving. mariusbutuc joined #xwiki at 14:39 mflorea - (14:47): guys, do you know why a query like: mflorea - (14:47): $context.xWiki.store.search("select doc from XWikiDocument doc where doc.fullName like '%'||?||'%'", 30, 0, ["Main.WebHome"], $context.context) mflorea - (14:47): would return multiple results on XE? All returned documents have fullName equal to Main.WebHome, but have different ids. vmassol joined #xwiki at 14:48 tmortagne - (14:48): mflorea: translations mflorea - (14:48): hmm, I see mflorea - (14:48): makes sense mflorea - (14:49): thanks tmortagne tmortagne - (14:50): mflorea: np mariusbutuc left #xwiki at 15:01 florinciu left at 15:38 (Read error: Connection reset by peer florinciu joined #xwiki at 15:39 jvelociter - (15:43): annotations separated from comments in a serious flaw in our UI todau jvelociter - (15:43): today jvelociter - (15:44): it's very very hard for someone to know a document has been annotated jvelociter - (15:45): -> you don't have the number of annotations in the tab, like you do for comments and attachments jvelociter - (15:45): -> when you click "Annotations" on the top right corner, you still don't know if there are annotations jvelociter - (15:46): and if you click the checkbox "show annotations", you still don't know if there are annotations jvelociter - (15:46): (you have to scroll through the whole document) silviar left #xwiki at 15:59 mflorea - (16:03): guys, is there a way to get the document rendered title using the document access bridge? I have a document reference. mflorea - (16:04): there are some methods in DAB to get the content but none for the title vmassol left at 16:31 (Quit: Leaving. annacondan left at 16:37 (Quit: annacondan kibahop joined #xwiki at 16:37 sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 16:38 kibahop left at 16:38 (Client Quit annacondan joined #xwiki at 16:41 Enygma` left at 16:49 (Quit: Leaving. vmassol joined #xwiki at 17:03 mflorea - (17:07): DAB has a setDocumentTitle method but doesn't have a getDocumentTitle.. jvelociter - (17:10): mflorea: maybe you can add it ? mflorea - (17:10): :) florinciu left at 17:16 (Quit: Leaving. annacondan left at 17:24 (Quit: annacondan wiki\_freak joined #xwiki at 17:27 wiki\_freak is now known as sadid ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) sadid - (17:42): Hello! I've installed xwiki on Fedora in my /home/my\_user\_name/.xwiki sadid - (17:43): where does my documents store? sdumitriu - (17:43): .xwiki/database sadid - (17:44): OK Thanks is enough to copy or store it for backup... sadid - (17:45): I've used it personally sdumitriu - (17:45): Yes, enough sadid - (17:45): sdumitriu: Thanks mflorea left at 17:47 (Quit: Leaving. anamarias joined #xwiki at 17:47 sadid left at 17:50 (Quit: ChatZilla 0.9.86 [Firefox 3.5.9/20100330072020] annacondan joined #xwiki at 18:22 vmassol left at 18:27 (Quit: Leaving. anamarias left at 18:32 (Remote host closed the connection tmortagne1 joined #xwiki at 18:34 tmortagne left at 18:34 (Read error: No route to host evalica left at 18:35 (Read error: Connection reset by peer sdumitriu left at 18:42 (Quit: Leaving. jvdrean left at 18:44 (Quit: Leaving. KermitTheFragger left at 18:53 (Quit: Leaving jvelociter left at 19:01 (Quit: jvelociter tmortagne1 left at 19:13 (Quit: Leaving. abusenius left at 19:18 (Ping timeout: 268 seconds abusenius joined #xwiki at 19:55 arkub left at 20:21 (Ping timeout: 252 seconds lucaa joined #xwiki at 20:38 lucaa left at 20:45 (Ping timeout: 265 seconds mflorea joined #xwiki at 20:53 vmassol joined #xwiki at 22:17 Sorinello left at 22:19 (Quit: Peace and Protection 4.22 Sorinello joined #xwiki at 22:20 annacondan left at 22:39 (Quit: annacondan lucaa joined #xwiki at 22:52 mflorea left at 23:05 (Quit: Leaving. vmassol left at 23:17 (Quit: Leaving.
